name: Assassin
abilities: Any time you would take two or more damage from a single source, you take 1 less damage.

name: Berserker
abilities: The defense number on your cards is treated as 1 instead of the printed number.

name: Rogue
abilities: You can make an additional attack on your turn immediately after your first, but you must target the same opponent for both attacks.

name: Sorcerer
abilities: Your magic can deal 1 damage and heal 1 health instead of its normal ability.

name: Warlock
abilities: Your magic can deal 3 damage or heal 3 health instead of its normal ability.

name: Warrior
abilities: Damage from your attacks is reduced 1 less by defenses.

name: Wizard
abilities: Your magic deals 1 damage in addition to its normal ability. All damage targets the same opponent.
